t: Don't Rely on Amazon for Legitimate Supplements, Study Finds
s: August 24, 2022 - Researchers tested immune-boosting supplements purchased on Amazon and found that more than half did not contain what the label claimed.

t: The 10 Best-Selling Vitamins & Supplements on Amazon - Healthgrades
s: December 17, 2021 - Vitamins and supplements may not always have scientifically proven benefits, but they are popular among many patients. Learn the top-selling vitamins and supplements on Amazon and patients should know about the potential benefits and risks.

t: NSF Testing for Amazon Dietary Supplement Policy | NSF
s: NSF tests and certifies supplements for compliance under the Amazon Dietary Supplement Policy.

t: Amazon's Dietary Supplements Policy 2024: What You Need To Know | NSF
s: February 18, 2025 - A groundbreaking 2024 NSF study shows consumers are willing to pay 11% more for certified supplements. Amazon sellers can leverage certification to differentiate their brands from competitors, reduce supply chain risks and increase consumer transparency.

t: Amazon sellers paying the high price of updated dietary supplements policy
s: August 8, 2024 - Vox Nutrition has made a sizable investment to offset the costly tests associated with Amazon’s new TIC requirements, however, the private label manufacturer admits many of their smaller clients have still been forced to jump ship.

t: FTC Charges Supplement Marketer with Hijacking Ratings and Reviews on Amazon.com and Using Them to Deceive Consumers | Federal Trade Commission
s: February 16, 2023 - Bountiful, based in Bohemia, New York, manufactures vitamin, mineral, and other nutritional supplements. Its brands include Nature’s Bounty and Sundown. Bountiful sells its supplements to Amazon, which then sells them to consumers on Amazon.com.

t: Testing program reveals subpar quality of supplements sold on Amazon
s: March 28, 2025 - aSquared, Healthy Way, NasaBe'Ahava and We Like Vitamins had less than 35% potency in both 2020 and 2022. As of the date this article was published, none of these brands had responded to requests for comment. The potency results, according to Richard, are an indication that quality issues are ...

t: Is It Safe to Buy Supplements on Amazon? | Fullscript
s: January 20, 2025 - Buying supplements on Amazon? Learn about risks like counterfeit products and inaccurate labels. Choose trusted sources for quality and safety.

t: How to Sell Supplements on Amazon: Regulations, Product Research, & Suppliers
s: May 31, 2024 - Discover how to sell supplements on Amazon successfully. Learn about regulations, optimizing product listings, and more.

t: New Amazon Supplement Policy: What You Need to Know | Envision Horizons
s: April 18, 2024 - The new Amazon supplement compliance policy went into effect on April 2, 2024. Under this policy, dietary supplement brands and sellers must verify product compliance through approved third-party testing and certification organizations.

t: How to Avoid Buying Counterfeit Supplements Online - ConsumerLab.com
s: March 3, 2025 - ConsumerLab explains how to avoid counterfeit vitamins and supplements when shopping online on Amazon, Walmart.com, and other sites. Learn to identify authorized sites and sellers and avoid fake supplements. Use the brand-by-brand guide to protect yourself from risk.

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - In 2014, Amazon launched Amazon Elements, a line of domestic products including baby wipes and (formerly) diapers. In 2017, the brand introduced a line of vitamins and supplements.

t: 10 Vitamin Brands Dietitians Actually Recommend to Their Clients
s: The best vitamin brands are independently verified, contain quality ingredients, and are transparent. Learn which brands our registered dietitians recommend.

t: Insights: Vitamins and Supplements category on Amazon
s: According to the NIH, 77% of all vitamin and supplements sales made online in the US happen on Amazon. The top destination for ecommerce sales, it is too important for vitamins and supplement brands to ignore.

t: How to Sell Vitamins, Minerals, and Supplements on Amazon
s: July 1, 2024 - This blog breaks down Amazon's current vitamins, minerals, and supplements market, discusses brands' biggest challenges and pitfalls, and reveals specific marketing and advertising strategies proven to help brands grow in this category.
